components.description: The Khanda, the symbol of the Sikhism.
components.title: Khanda

description: The Khanda, the symbol of the Sikhism.
title: Khanda

version.description:
Unicode 15.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on September 13, 2022. 20 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 31 new emojis (including sequences) listed under Emoji 15.0.

 

  • 📝 Unicode 15.0 details on Unicode.org

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the Khanda emoji is rendered with striking clarity, its metallic sheen catching the light with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The circular emblem and crossed swords are depicted with sharp, defined edges and subtle gradients, conveying a sense of strength and spiritual devotion. This symbol of Sikhism is presented with a dignified and respectful aesthetic, as seen across Apple’s emoji collection, embodying faith and unity.
